bug.author: niuwenju
bug.summary: ERROR when convert ONNX to IR in Instance Segmentation
bug.description:
i have successfully converted mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.pkl to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx but when i convert mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml and mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin, got error as follows: [ ERROR ] Shape is not defined for output 3 of "639". [ ERROR ] Cannot infer shapes or values for node "639". [ ERROR ] Not all output shapes were inferred or fully defined for node "639". For more information please refer to Model Optimizer FAQ (<denchmark-link:https://docs.openvinotoolkit.org/latest/_docs_MO_DG_prepare_model_Model_Optimizer_FAQ.html>https://docs.openvinotoolkit.org/latest/_docs_MO_DG_prepare_model_Model_Optimizer_FAQ.html</denchmark-link> ), question <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/training_extensions/pull/40>#40</denchmark-link> . [ ERROR ] [ ERROR ] It can happen due to bug in custom shape infer function <function ExperimentalDetectronDetectionOutput.infer at 0x7f08d9360268>. Environment:
OS: Linux Ubuntu 18.04 Framework version: PyTorch Python version: 3.5.2 OpenVINO version: 2020 1 CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0/7.5 GPU model and memory: IntelÂ® HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2)
and when use OpenVINO version: 2019 R3.1 it can successfully convert mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml and mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin, but there is also some error when run the dome python tools/demo.py --dataset coco_2017_val --ckpt pretrained_models/ir/coco/detectron/FP16/mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin --fit_window 800 1333 --video test1.mp4 --delay 1 --show_fps openvino --model pretrained_models/ir/coco/detectron/FP16/mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml --device GPU as follows: RuntimeError: Unknown Layer Type: ExperimentalDetectronPriorGridGenerator Exception ignored in: <bound method OpenVINONet.del of <segmentoly.rcnn.openvino_net.MaskRCNNOpenVINO object at 0x7fbd4e800908>> Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/dcg/Downloads/instance_segmentation/segmentoly/rcnn/openvino_net.py", line 77, in del del self.exec_net AttributeError: exec_net

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/niuwenju>@niuwenju</denchmark-link>
and when use OpenVINO version: 2019 R3.1 it can successfully convert mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml and mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin, but there is also some error when run the dome python tools/demo.py --dataset coco_2017_val --ckpt pretrained_models/ir/coco/detectron/FP16/mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin --fit_window 800 1333 --video test1.mp4 --delay 1 --show_fps openvino --model pretrained_models/ir/coco/detectron/FP16/mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml --device GPU
GPU plugin does not support this model and looks like it will not be added in the future ðŸ˜ž
i have successfully converted mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.pkl to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx but when i convert mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml and mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin, got error as follows: and when use OpenVINO version: 2019 R3.1 it can successfully convert mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.onnx to mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.xml and mask_rcnn_resnet50_fpn_2x.bin
It's issue with latest release, we will try to solve it.
